ygData.subject: Re: rogue clockworks
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, its bad with the RogueClockWork Faction (I kid you not). Since those are evil then it sorta is bad for you faction... I mean it all depends on where
ygData.messageBody:
Well, its bad with the RogueClockWork Faction (I kid you not). Since those
are 'evil' then it sorta is bad for you faction... I mean it all depends on
where you're going. If you want to be evil, then yeah, its bad for your
faction. If you want to be "good" then its good for your faction.

Be careful.. they swarm from far away.

(I have a low level gnomish magician)
-----Original Message-----
From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 12:11 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] rogue clockworks


Does anyone know weather or not killing rogue clockworks is bad for your
faction?
in Steamfont . ..
